title: Help Selecting a Marksman for Solo Q
body:
Hey guys,


I need to know which ADC ...

>Can be first picked 
>Safe (has an escape etc)
>Low skill cap?

replies.body: JINX. u got it.
I would not suggest that. Positioning is *way* too important for her.

I bought a ticket on the {{champion:18}} Tristana{{champion:18}} hype train a while back. Got me pretty far honestly. I don't know if she is as great anymore though, but she is who I used to carry soloque.

She also relatively fulfills your provided criteria too, so yeah.

Trist is still amazing lol, the amount of mobility with w resets, and her pushing power, only thing which she isn't that great at is huge amounts of burst, like Graves ADC, she hits like a truck and you can build a lot of ad on her because of the q steroid, literally all she needs is a shiv/ghost blade for attk speed, her drawback is armor penentration, but that is so she is balanced.

why low skill cap? 
just learn to use Vayne/Corki/Graves
they carry soloqueue the hardest imo

> [{quoted}](name=Justify,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=L4IM5w9n,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-21T07:08:20.737+0000)
>
> why low skill cap? 
> just learn to use Vayne/Corki/Graves
> they carry soloqueue the hardest imo

Maybe he doesn't play adc but still needs to be able to play the role if forced to in ranked.

If you don't main adc, you don't want to play hundreds of games learning a champ in a role you don't play.

That would be my first guess for why he requests low skill cap.

But then he says "can be first picked" and suddenly I don't understand.

> [{quoted}](name=Jakiron,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=L4IM5w9n,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2014-12-21T08:50:17.492+0000)
 
> If you don't main adc, you don't want to play hundreds of games learning a champ in a role you don't play.

Except ADC is one of the best roles to main to carry soloqueue

> [{quoted}](name=Justify,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=L4IM5w9n,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-21T09:42:05.354+0000)
>
> Except ADC is one of the best roles to main to carry soloqueue

Irrelevant. Just because it's best for carrying doesn't mean everyone wants to main it.

Is there any proof to your statement or is it just opinion.

I'm pretty sure a good jungler has way more impact on a game in general over an adc, but that's just my opinion.

Jg is probably the second best role to main to carry solo queue, just because a good jgler can setup a tonne of counterganks/ganks/shot calling.

I say ADC is the best because 99% of bronze-silver ADCs cannot position, unless they spam that role and learn it indepth, in which case they will climb solo queue ladder quite fast. 

Middle lane is right up there with ADC, if they get too fed, and know how to snowball an advantage, they will wreck havoc for the bot/top lanes, literally 1 shotting/chunking everything. 

Thing with middle lane though, if you don't snowball you are in trouble, especially if their ADC is good and yours is bad. 
Most games mid doesn't get overly fed if the ADC/Supp knows map awareness/warding, it really comes down to whether or not your team really wants that win, if they do they will proceed with caution when mid is mia etc

Orianna is quite good late so you don't need to snowball on champs like that.
What I meant by "can be first picked" I meant if their ADC hasn't been pick who can I just blind pick in?

any ADC. very very few people try to counterpick ADC vs ADC. its the supports you need to watch out for, or the jungler or the mid.

only really Ez gets shat on by draven but not many play draven in lower elos.
all others its basically a skill match up. even the supposed hard counter cait vs vayne.
lucian has trouble vs a few because of range but other than that everyone does fine against each other enough to not get dumpstered in lane.

oh wait, sivir vs draven is cancer. poor sivir doesnt even exist vs a half decent draven...let alone a good one.
I prefer playing Mid or Top I always ask Mid/top pref every ranked game but if I have to play ADC or supp I need a champ to play that doesn't require the best mechanics

Caitlyn, Corki or Graves. Pretty safe AD's. Caitlyn and Graves are pretty brainless, Corki less so but he's not "mechanically intensive" or anything.

Trist and Lucian can still be ok but aren't the all-round beasts they once were.

Mark my words once LCS starts again, it will be Corki, Caitlyn and Sivir becoming the top 3 most picked.

sivir will get pointlessly nerfed before she gets much more play in LCS, no idea why since she is kind of underpowered atm overall.
cait will be Dlift exclusive mostly because she is %%%%.

everyone plays corki. pocket ezreals all around. graves and lucian decent picks.
pocket twitch will come back out, isnt picked atm because people are testing the waters with the double AD comp with the AD mids.
jinx will come out as a counterpick for lane swapping. sivir will only come out for push comps again once they pointlessly nerf her again.
sneaky will throw atleast 2 pocket MFs out. possibly for lane swaps.
corki trist and lucian. top 3 ADCs and almost always will be. also fulfill all requirements.
Wasn't Lucian gutted?

his passive was the latest thing. but that doesnt mean his whole kit isnt insanely strong.

i do just as well with current lucian as with any previous version of lucian. you just need to know what your doing (dont spam abilities without using the passive, especially since its what makes your E so overpowered) ult minion waves since its not that good for fighting champs unless you use it for the AA reset and passive proc or build like 9000% AS and have AS buffs from allies and try to get that awesome 10k hit ult off.

lucian can win lane vs almost anyone atm. even with the nerfs. draven and corki are proly the only ones who really bully him but even then a good lucian can flog a corki into the dust. but not a draven...ouchies lvl 3 2shotting.

I like Twitch, Jinx and Sivir personally.

Depends on your playstyle though, if you can just try a bunch of adc in norms and see who works best for you I think that's the best way to find one.

Tristana?...

Is good Early and Late, very good with Thresh.

Her escape is pretty bad.

And yes, low skill cap.
Cait is too risky, if you fall behind you are weak AF, if you stay even you will lose because of the enemy ADCs powerspike.
Corki, Cait or Graves

Vayne

Although Blue Ez is REALLY strong right now
Caitlyn, obviously.
